name: Kawaii Monster Trainer Avatar Maker
description:
This is an amazing world where fantastic creatures with exceptional abilities help humans explore territories and have fun in the process! You are a monster trainer and you have to be ready for whatever comes, including battles with other trainers. Choose clothes that match your personality and also help you during your coaching tasks. You can choose between more casual and comfortable clothes as well as cuter and more delicate clothes.

And don't forget to take your monster companion on your journey to help you in your task of befriending new cute little monsters.

Have a good time!

Game: Kawaii Games

Artist: Tizy Izumy
